OCaml Labs

These are software packages developed and maintained at OCaml Labs, either directly by us or with our industrial collaborators at Citrix, Jane Street, OCamlPro, and of course with a huge amount of help from the wider OCaml community.

Maintainer opensource@janestreet.com
Dependencies camlp4 & ocamlfind & type_conv = 109.07.00
Last update May 15, 2014
Source https://ocaml.janestreet.com/ocaml-core/109.07.00/individual/pa_ounit-109.07.00.tar.gz
055e9ad8070834c72e9c8e26641b9125

Syntax extension for oUnit

Pa_ounit is a syntax extension that helps writing in-line oUnit. It takes care of automatically registering the tests and generates helpfull failure messages with the file and line number.

It allows user to register tests with a new TEST top-level expressions and automatically collects all the tests in a module (in a function ounit_tests of type unit -> OUnit.test).

Dependencies
type_conv ( = 109.07.00 )
ocamlfind
camlp4

async_extra
